1553322222222222222222221.content:
Rachel was a 18 year old senior girl that was the track star of her school. She had long, brown hair put into a ponytail with blue eyes and dimples. She was a petite girl with an athletic body with small feet. She had a friendly and energetic personality that had a very ticklish stomach and feet.

Skylar was a 16 year old foreign exchange student from Australia. She was a thing of beauty, with dark blonde hair and piercing blue eyes with braces. She had a model like body with very long legs with ticklish thighs and upperbody. She stayed at Rachel's house while she was an exchange student.

Where were the girls?
1553322222222222222222221.title: Rachel and Skylar

15533222222222222222222211.content:
Rachel and Skylar's Situation: Both girls got home from school and Rachel goes for a run to stay in shape for track, while Skylar relaxes in the living room and watches TV until she gets back.

Frank and Carl's Situation: These two creeps were stalkers of Rachel over the past year after her dad fired them as employees and they wanted to take revenge. These men were fired by Rachel's dad because they started a "Tickle Fetish Club" after hours in his office building. They were both janitors and would let the other members of the club in the building to participate in tickle torture of employees or other girls they managed to bribe, trick or force to come.

"Right on schedule" Frank stated looking out the window of his van while watching Rachel walk out of her house and go for a run. "We have about 30 minutes until she gets back" Carl stated while sitting in the passenger's seat of the van. "We need to wait 10 more minutes and then we can go through with our plan" Frank replied back. "I hope she falls for it" Carl said with some hesitation. "Don't worry, we have a full proof plan, nothing can go wrong" Frank reassured Carl.

What was their plan?
